this_title: Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers: Live at the Olympic - The Last DJ and More
introduction: Recorded on October 16th, 2002, catch Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers as they tear up the stage in the Grand Olympic Auditorium, Los Angeles. Touring to coincide with the LAST DJ album, this show captures the record in its entirety. A two-disc set, disc one features the tracks "Have Love Will Travel," "Money Becomes King," "Blue Sunday," "Like a Diamond," and many others. The second disc is a four track audio CD, including "I'm Crying," "I Got a Woman," and more.
chinese_title: Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers: Live at the Olympic - The Last DJ and More
